text: While the #COVID19 vaccine is a huge breakthrough, many are reluctant to get vaccinated. To help address #vaccine hesitancy, @TimesUnion is hosting a panel 1/12 at 7 p.m. with community leaders & experts, including Dr. Eric Yager and Dr. Stacy Pettigrew. https://t.co/YS6HEG0VK1 https://t.co/saxfGmOtQC
